item.title: Mortgage rates tick higher but remain near 3-year low

item.title: Fed's favored inflation gauge shows consumer prices remained elevated in November
item.description: The Commerce Department's delayed November PCE inflation report showed that inflation remained well above the Federal Reserve's 2% target rate.
